The reverse image search of the mansion: including a 2013 article about the sale of his "half-built mansion" on a South African property website.
The mansion seen in the Facebook post is: known landmark in Bedfordview, an affluent suburb in eastern Johannesburg, and not in Sandton as claimed in the post.
A Johannesburg businessman: who designed the three-storey home, confirmed that it is not Julius Malema's house and had to post security guards outside due to harassment from people wanting to see "Malema's house."
A Facebook user named Alexandra Da Silva: who claimed the house as her family's home, pleaded for people to stop sharing false information about their residence, as they have no affiliation with Julius Malema.
